title: What is Hard Flaccid Syndrome?
content: What is Hard Flaccid Syndrome? # History # Etymology # Citations #

title: Literature
content:
Literature # The Goldstein Article (2023) # Goldstein, I., Yee, A., & Komisaruk, B. (2023). Hard Flaccid Syndrome Proposed to Be Secondary to Pathological Activation of a Pelvic/Pudendal-Hypogastric Reflex. AUA News (May 2023). Other # Gul, M., Towe, M., Yafi, F. A., & Serefoglu, E. C. (2019). Hard flaccid syndrome: Initial report of four cases. International Journal of Impotence Research, 32(2), 176–179.
Gul, M., Huynh, L. M., El-Khatib, F. M., Yafi, F. A., & Serefoglu, E. C. (2019). A qualitative analysis of internet forum discussions on hard flaccid syndrome. International Journal of Impotence Research, 32(5), 503–509.
Abdessater, M., Kanbar, A., Akakpo, W., & Beley, S. (2020). Hard flaccid syndrome: State of current knowledge. Basic and Clinical Andrology, 30(1).
Nico, E., Rubin, R., & Trosch, L. (2022). 203 successful treatment of hard flaccid syndrome: A case report. The Journal of Sexual Medicine, 19(Supplement_1).
Sullivan, J., Salter, C., Flores, J., Guhring, P., Parker, M., & Mulhall, J. (2022). Exploring erectile hemodynamics in men complaining of hard-flaccid syndrome (HFS). The Journal of Urology, 207(5S), e1048.
Hammad, M. A. M., Barham, D. W., Loeb, C., Serefoglu, E. C., & Yafi, F. A. (2023). (432) Efficacy of Low-Intensity Shockwave Therapy on Hard Flaccid Syndrome: Initial Report of Three Cases. The Journal of Sexual Medicine, 20(Supplement_1), May 2023.

Goldstein, I., Komisaruk, B., Goldstein, S., & Yee, A. (2024). (149) prevalence of lumbosacral annular tears in individuals with hard flaccid syndrome. The Journal of Sexual Medicine, 21(Supplement_1).
Niedenfuehr, J., & Stevens, D. M. (2024). Hard flaccid syndrome symptoms, comorbidities, and self-reported efficacy and satisfaction of treatments: a cross-sectional survey. International journal of impotence research, 10.1038/s41443-024-00853-2. Advance online publication.
Gryzinski, G., Hammad, M. M., Alzweri, L., Azad, B., Barham, D., Lumbiganon, S., Serefoglu, E. C., & Yafi, F. (2024, June 19). Hard-flaccid syndrome: A survey of sexual medicine practitioners’ knowledge and experience. Nature News.
Yazar, R. O., Hammad, M. A., Barham, D. W., Azad, B., & Yafi, F. A. (2024). Successful treatment of hard flaccid syndrome with multimodal therapy: A case report study. International Journal of Impotence Research.
Mentions Hard Flaccid Syndrome # Ocampo Flórez, G. M., Carvajal Obando, A., & García-Perdomo, H. A. (2022). Association between partial thrombosis of the corpus cavernosum, partial priapism, and hard flaccid syndrome: A scoping review. Andrology, 10(5), 844–851.
Gul, M., Fode, M., Urkmez, A., Capogrosso, P., Falcone, M., Sarikaya, S., Sokolakis, I., Morgado, A., Morozov, A., Albersen, M., Russo, G. I., & Serefoglu, E. C. (2024). A clinical guide to rare male sexual disorders. Nature Reviews Urology, 21(1), 35–49.
